duties_responsibilities.duty: Build and grow the largest community of arts, crafts, and culinary class providers across the US.
Cold-call and recruit partners including individual artists & makers, cooking schools, and mixologists/cocktail class providers.
Conduct field sales in Seattle and other cities to recruit new partners when appropriate.
Utilize the latest sales tools for effective sales funnel and pipeline management.
Work closely with the team in Sydney, Australia and report to the ClassBento Partnerships Manager.
Be a team player and work well with the team in Portland and Sydney.

education_certification.credential: At least 1 year experience working as Sales Representative (hunter), field sales, or telesales executive
